solution_line_template: There are {servings_per_bottle} servings in 1 bottle and they charge ${charge_per_serving} per serving so that's {servings_per_bottle}*{charge_per_serving} = $<<{servings_per_bottle}*{charge_per_serving}={revenue_per_bottle}>>{revenue_per_bottle}

1 bottle yields ${revenue_per_bottle} and they spent ${cost_per_bottle} for the bottle so they make {revenue_per_bottle}-{cost_per_bottle} = $<<{revenue_per_bottle}-{cost_per_bottle}={profit_per_bottle}>>{profit_per_bottle} on each bottle
